var render = function render() {

            { attrs: { fluid: "" } },

                    [

                                          ],

                                        ),
                                      ]
                                    },
                                  },

                                    key: "default",
                                    fn: function (dialog) {

                                              {

                                                  dark: "",

                                                  },

                                                    ),
                                                  ]
                                                ),

                                              [

                                                  "v-container",
                                                  { attrs: { fluid: "" } },
                                                  [
                                                    _c(
                                                      "v-subheader",
                                                      [
                                                        _vm._v(
                                                          "Définissez l'ordre et vos villes pour les escales "
                                                        ),
                                                        _c("v-spacer"),
                                                        _c(
                                                          "v-btn",
                                                          {
                                                            attrs: {
                                                              small: "",
                                                              rounded: "",
                                                              icon: "",
                                                              title:
                                                                "Ajouter une ville",
                                                            },
                                                            on: {
                                                              click: function (
                                                                $event
                                                              ) {
                                                                return _vm.ajouterNouvelleVilleEscale()
                                                              },
                                                            },
                                                          },
                                                          [
                                                            _c(
                                                              "v-icon",
                                                              {
                                                                attrs: {
                                                                  color:
                                                                    "black",
                                                                  size: "20",
                                                                },
                                                              },
                                                              [
                                                                _vm._v(
                                                                  "mdi-plus"
                                                                ),
                                                              ]
                                                            ),
                                                          ],
                                                          1
                                                        ),
                                                      ],
                                                      1
                                                    ),
                                                    _vm._l(
                                                      _vm.villesEscalesList,
                                                      function (ville, index) {
                                                        return _c(
                                                          "v-row",
                                                          {
                                                            key: index,
                                                            attrs: {
                                                              justify:
                                                                "space-between",
                                                            },
                                                          },
                                                          [
                                                            _c(
                                                              "v-col",
                                                              {
                                                                attrs: {
                                                                  cols: "3",
                                                                },
                                                              },
                                                              [

                                                                  "v-text-field",
                                                                  {

                                                                      color:
                                                                        "black",
                                                                      dense: "",

                                                                        "",
                                                                      rounded:

                                                                      type: "number",

                                                                      label:
                                                                        "N° Ordre",
                                                                    },
                                                                  }
                                                                ),
                                                              ],

                                                            ),
                                                            _c(
                                                              "v-col",
                                                              {

                                                                },
                                                              },
                                                              [

                                                                    "item-text":
                                                                      "designation",
                                                                    "item-value":
                                                                      "designation",

                                                                  },

                                                                    },
                                                                    on: {

                                                                        function (
                                                                          $event
                                                                        ) {

                                                                            index
                                                                          )
                                                                        },
                                                                    },
                                                                  },
                                                                  [
                                                                    _c(
                                                                      "v-icon",
                                                                      {

                                                                            "red",
                                                                        },
                                                                      },
                                                                      [
                                                                        _vm._v(
                                                                          "mdi-delete"
                                                                        ),
                                                                      ]
                                                                    ),
                                                                  ],

                                                                ),
                                                              ],
                                                              1
                                                            ),
                                                          ],
                                                          1
                                                        )
                                                      }
                                                    ),
                                                  ],
                                                  2
                                                ),
                                              ],
                                              1
                                            ),
                                            _c(
                                              "v-card-actions",
                                              { staticClass: "justify-end" },
                                              [
                                                _c(
                                                  "v-btn",
                                                  {
                                                    attrs: { text: "" },
                                                    on: {
                                                      click: function ($event) {
                                                        dialog.value = false
                                                      },
                                                    },
                                                  },
                                                  [_vm._v("Effectuer")]
                                                ),
                                              ],
                                              1
                                            ),
                                          ],
                                          1
                                        ),
                                      ]
                                    },
                                  },
                                ]),

                            ],
                            1
                          ),
                        ],
                        1
                      ),
                    ],
                    1
                  ),
                ],
                1
              ),
            ],
            1
          ),

        1
      ),

  )
}
var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
